org.springframework.osgi.extender.support.scanning
Class DefaultConfigurationScanner

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.osgi.extender.support.scanning.DefaultConfigurationScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConfigurationScanner
public class DefaultConfigurationScanner
extends Object
implements ConfigurationScanner

Default implementation of ConfigurationScanner interface.

Supports Spring-Context manifest header and META-INF/spring/*.xml.

Author:
Costin Leau

Method Detail

getConfigurations

public String[] getConfigurations(Bundle bundle)
Description copied from interface: ConfigurationScanner
Returns an array of existing Spring configuration locations (as Strings) for the given bundle. If no resource was found, an empty/null array should be returned.

Specified by:
getConfigurations in interface ConfigurationScanner
Parameters:
bundle - non-null bundle intended for scanning
Returns:
Spring configuration locations
